name: Persistence (Pignomaster)
description:
Persistence is puzzle game based on the principle of persistence of vision. Made in around 3h, for the Trijam#140 - Theme: Optical Illusion

Controls (keyboard)

  • Space : Hide the layout to start playing the level
  • Arrow Keys : Move

If you are not familiar with persistence of vision. Check the little video below !

Each level starts with the layout of the maze visible. The goal is to keep your eyes focused on the marker in the middle of the screen. After a moment (10 to 30 seconds can be enough), press down your spacebar to make the maze disappear, and let the  magic of persistence of vision occur !

/!\ Of course even after the layout disappears, you have to keep your eyes focused on the marker, otherwise you will probably not be able to "see" the way and make your way to the arrival.

Pro tips: When the persistence seems to fade out, try to blink. It will 'refresh' your vision.
